xtc.lang.blink

Interface NativeDebugger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NativeCDB, NativeGDB

    public interface NativeDebugger
    The exported feature from the native debugger controlled under the Blink.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  NativeDebugger.LanguageTransitionEventType
      Transition type between Java and native code.
